_sText:
Here it comes ! The V2 of mg_polar_panic. For this version i fixed one terrorist spawn (on the last version he has no pushing abilities), i re-designed the map with all new textures and a look more like Crash Bash's original polar panic.
A new feature, the laser, who's disintegrate the one who touch it (the laser appears randomly on the center of the platform, and it appears 8 seconds.)

Try it and like it !
